channel.title: ssh on Andi Rückauer
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on Andi Rückauer

item.title: How to Setup passwordless SSH Login to Nine Server
item.description: Add fingerprint to known_hosts andi@arueckauer:~$ ssh-keyscan -H arueckauer01.nine.ch >> ~/.ssh/known_hosts Add key to server andi@arueckauer:~$ cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub | ssh www-data@arueckauer01.nine.ch 'cat >> ~/.ssh/authorized_keys' www-data@arueckauer01.nine.ch's password: SSH Configuration ~/.ssh/config Host arueckauer01 arueckauer01.nine.ch HostName arueckauer01.nine.ch IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa User www-data LocalForward 3310 localhost:3306 Alias ~/.bashrc alias arueckauer01='ssh arueckauer01'
